detectors.description:
KayaFinance.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KayaFinance.sol#80-85) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KayaFinance.sol#82)
detectors.markdown:
[KayaFinance.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KayaFinance.sol#L80-L85) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KayaFinance.sol#L82)

detectors.description:
KayaFinance.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KayaFinance.sol#87-93) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = safeSub(balances[from],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KayaFinance.sol#88)
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KayaFinance.sol#90)

detectors.description: Variable KayaFinance._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KayaFinance.sol#41) is not in mixedCase

	- _totalSupply = 12000000000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KayaFinance.sol#56)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KayaFinance.sol#9)
	- KayaFinance.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KayaFinance.sol#62-64)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- KayaFinance.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KayaFinance.sol#66-68)
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KayaFinance.sol#10)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KayaFinance.sol#11)
	- KayaFinance.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KayaFinance.sol#70-72)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KayaFinance.sol#12)
	- KayaFinance.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KayaFinance.sol#80-85)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KayaFinance.sol#13)
	- KayaFinance.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KayaFinance.sol#74-78)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KayaFinance.sol#30)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/KayaFinance.sol#30-32)
